description.text:
(Translated from Chinese by AI)
1. Fixed issues related to physical mouse control.  
2. New feature: Long-press the update button in the dialog box to jump to GitHub.  
3. New feature: Users can request microphone recording permissions in the launcher settings.  
4. Fixed the issue where the perspective movement was very slow when using an external mouse with a high report rate.

（若启动器内下载缓慢请使用网盘下载,64位的请下载arm64，不知道该下哪个的请下载all）
1.修复实体鼠标控制相关问题
2.新增功能：长按更新对话框内的“更新”跳转Github
3.新增功能：在启动器设置内可申请麦克风录音权限
4.修复外接鼠标高回报率时视角移动很慢的问题
